title: New Digital Custodian Promises RIAs Big Savings
text:
Altruist – a new digital, commission-free custodian for RIAs – will save advisors up to 90% on technology and custody costs, says founder Jason Wenk, in an interview with RIAIntel.

For years, Charles Schwab and other behemoth custodians that oversee trillions of dollars in assets have battled for advisors’ and investors’ money, going tit for tat on price reductions and expanding their service offerings.
